abstract: United States wins its third women's team title at world gymnastics championships, establishing itself as the team to beat at the 2012 Olympics.
snippet: With a convincing victory at the world gymnastics championships, the Americans established themselves as the favorites in next year’s Olympics.
lead_paragraph: With a convincing victory at the world gymnastics championships, the Americans established themselves as the favorites in next year’s Olympics.

headline.main: U.S. Takes Gymnastics Title Despite Injury to Captain
headline.print_headline: U.S. Takes Title Despite Injury to Captain
headline.seo: U.S. Women Win World Gymnastics Title
